author: Joshua Rubin <jrubin@zvelo.com> (http://zvelo.com)
name: hashmash
description: A generic HashCash implementation with support for node, amd (requirejs), and simple browser implementations. Uses node child_process or Web Workers where available to speed up hash generation and maintain responsiveness.

scripts.coveralls: rm -rf lib-cov && ./node_modules/.bin/jscoverage lib lib-cov && HASHMASH_COV=1 mocha 'test/lib/node/*.js' -R mocha-lcov-reporter | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls
